input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel

Product features:
Each includes 2 fashions and trend-topping accessories
On-trend accessories include 2 amazing pairs of shoes (in different colors), statement pieces, and a handbag
Mix and match with other friends, fashions, and accessories (sold separately)
Dolls not included.
input_text.Response A:
The Barbie Fashion Night Looks collection by Mattel includes 6 dolls, 6 fashions, and trend-topping accessories. Barbie dolls are fashion forward and ready to make an entrance with the included trends and on-trend accessories. Each doll includes 2 fashions and accessories, so you can mix and match to create unique looks. The collection includes 6 dolls, 6 fashions, and trend-topping accessories. The On-trend accessories include 2 amazing pairs of shoes (in different colors), statement pieces, and a handbag.

The Barbie Fashion Night Looks collection is a great way to create unique and on-trend looks for your Barbie dolls. You can mix and match the fashions and accessories with other Barbie dolls and fashions. Each doll includes 2 fashions and accessories, so you can create different looks. The collection includes 6 dolls, 6 fashions, and trend-topping accessories, so you can create a whole night out look for your Barbie dolls.
input_text.Response B: Now this is a statement! Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel is the ultimate style for those nights out on the town with your girlfriends! With on-trend accessories that include 2 amazing pairs of shoes, a handbag and statement jewelry, you'll be ready to hit the town in style! Mix and match these fashions with other Barbie Fashion friends and fashions (sold separately) to create your own unique look. Dolls not included.
